name: Harry Galifianakis
summary: Harry Galifianakis. Actor: Keeping Up with the Joneses. Harry Galifianakis was born on 3 August 1935 in Durham, North Carolina, USA. He was an actor, known for Keeping Up with the Joneses (2016). He was previously married to Mary Frances Cashion. He died on 15 July 2018 in Wilkesboro, North Carolina, USA.
